extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite    Level 3 or above or 6.0 units at the 100 level in RELS

basic.description: This course provides an introduction to the methods and premises used in the modern quest to understand the historical facts of Jesus' life. Particular attention will be given to understanding the historical Jesus in his first-century socio-cultural context.
basic.subject: RELS
basic.title: Jesus: The Continuing Historical Quest
